website_summaries.verdict: 5-pack of 4.5-inch flat cut-off wheels, featuring patented alumina granules and ultra-thin design for less material loss.
pros: Patented alumina granules enhance cutting operation and reduce blackening of stainless steel when cut
Ultra-thin design for fast, burr-free cutting and minimal stainless steel material loss.2 full sheets of fiberglass for strength, safety, and accurate cutting angle
cons: Feedback on this product is mostly favorable, only complaint was regarding cutting life being too short

customer_reviews.title: great product for half the price
customer_reviews.text: Work well, no chipping or exploding wheels. I have pushed down on tool grade steel at 2" thick, ground it red hot and disk stayed true, used as stationary grinding wheel to cut odd corners and the wheel produced required results. dropped my grinder on the table when switching tools and the wheel broke through its connection point. they are quite thin and i believe this wasn't a design flaw as much as careless handling on my part. i will buy these again
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great Cut Off Wheels!
customer_reviews.text: Will cut and grind without breaking. Used one steady for about a hour grinding and cutting until about only a inch of wheel was left and it did not break. Wheel will flex when hard pressure is put on it without breaking which is great. Always wear a face shield when using a grinder to protect from flying dust and debris and in case wheel does break!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Great bang for your buck but they do not last long I would say you can cut the same amount with one radner wheel as you could with 3 of these
customer_reviews.author: J1

customer_reviews.title: exactly what he was looking for
customer_reviews.text: exactly what he was looking for , good price and arrived very fast , thank you
customer_reviews.author: Nancy W.

customer_reviews.title: Fast, Aggressive Cuts
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best cut-off wheel I've used so far: cuts fast and lasts longer than other wheels. I'll buy it again, but these will last me for quite some time before I need to re-order.....
customer_reviews.author: Richard Colombini

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Cut through 14/20 gauge steel without too much hassle. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: driven168

customer_reviews.title: Great wheel for cutting steel and through welds.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Good fit on spindle, grind very well, removes material quickly. Would recommend to others. Cons: Don't know of any.
customer_reviews.author: RPinOK

customer_reviews.title: Saved a bunch of money look just like the ones I saw at Lowe’s.
customer_reviews.text: Saved a bunch of money look just like the ones I saw at Lowe’s
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Cuts much better than some that cost three times as much. Does a real good job
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Product Review
customer_reviews.text: These cut-off wheels are the worst I have ever used. They are not worth buying. Spend a few more dollars and buy better quality.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Pio

customer_reviews.title: Work Great
customer_reviews.text: These fit my grinder and worked great for cutting bolts and metal ... good buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good service
customer_reviews.text: aggressive cutting, even on 1/4 inch steel . very durable and long lasting, will buy again,
customer_reviews.author: james cheek

customer_reviews.title: They last.... durable too.
customer_reviews.text: I liked to saw wheels. Plus they work and last.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth R. Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Break easily, very thin
customer_reviews.text: I've never experienced this with a cutoff wheel but the wheel fails where the arbor washer meets the cutting disk.
customer_reviews.author: seektruth

product_meta.title: 5 Pcs,Cut-off Wheel, B, 4.5" x .045" x 7/8-Inch Cutting Wheels, Double Reinforced Fiber Flat Grinding Wheel Aggressive Cutting Blades for Stainless Steel and Metal, for Grinders, MPA Certification
product_meta.description:
Size:115 mm-4.5 Inch| Color:5 PackGive the high speed and sharp electric grinders power cut off tool to you and look for quality designs to your cordless grinder cut off wheel. 
All these are for we know what troubles you.

Are you afraid that your porter cable angle grinder wheels will break easily?
Worried about cutting quality using normal electric cut off wheel tool?
Troubled by grinder cutting blades broken frequently?
Wanna have durable and reliable grinder disc wheels?
Worry about the color deviation of stainless steel material after cutting?

Now, you can get rid of all these worries with our supreme cut off wheel!
T41-A/F46Q4BF 4.5" x .045" x 7/8-Inch, 25-Pack, Max RPM: 13300, MPA

Professional Quality
Our company is a manufacturer which is specialized in the production of cutting discs. 
We concentrate on creating professional cutting disk quality.

Fast and Aggressive Cuts
After a series of technical improvements, and thousands of cutting test of our united abrasives cut off wheel, 
the sharpness of our grinder wheels 4 1/2 inches for angle grinder is enhanced. 
Good fit on spindle, and grind very well, and also removes material quickly. 
Fit grinder and work great for cutting bolts and metal. 
The side grinder cut off blades bring a faster and sharper cutting experience to you.

Extensive Use
Our cutting disk has a wide range of uses, 
which can be used to cut steel tubes, steel plates, square steel, stainless steel, and copper and aluminum plates and so on. 
Our cutoff wheels can meet the multiple daily and industrial cutting needs

Independent packing
The package of 5 sets of 5 thin cut metal wheel constitutes a packaging box of 25 pieces, 
which is convenient to take out a small amount of cutting disc at a time and is helpful for the full storage of metal cut off wheel that are not used.
feature_bullets: Excellent Performance, Stable and Durable: Our cut off wheel uses advanced production technology and high quality raw and accessories materials, so the angle grinder cutting wheel is with high tensile, impact and bending strength, and cutting performance.

Thin Double Meshes and Sharpness: The cutting wheels are designed with ultra-thin double nets. While ensuring the sharpness, it can also make the tile saw blade more durable, and not easy to blow up. So it can be used safer.

High-Quality Ring-hole Design: Our cut off wheel is designed with unique ring-hole, which is made of high-quality stainless steel material. Therefore, the ring-hole is firm enough and not easy to fall off.

Reinforced Alumina Granules and Quality Assurance: The use of high strength reinforced alumina granules of our cordless angle grinder wheel, and combines the fiberglass materials and meshes closely, so that the angle grinder sanding disc is strong and durable, and not easy to break.

Thin Disk Design: Our metal cutting blade is designed in thin disk, making possible the cutting of various metals with high speed. The benchmark abrasive wheel has outstanding sharpness and wear resistance, ensuring its longer lasting service life.
